description: This Dart source file defines the OceanTheme class, which provides theme configurations for a Flutter application, including light and dark ThemeData instances with custom color schemes, text themes, and component styling.

classes.name: OceanTheme
classes.description: Provides static methods and properties for theme configurations, including methods for creating light and dark ThemeData for Flutter apps.

methods.name: _textTheme
methods.description: Generates a TextTheme with customized styles based on the provided color, using a modern rounded font style.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The primary color used for text styles.

methods.name: _lightTheme
methods.description: Constructs the ThemeData for the light theme, customizing components like AppBar, Card, Dialog, Buttons, etc., with specific color scheme and styling.

methods.name: _darkTheme
methods.description: Constructs the ThemeData for the dark theme, with its own color scheme and styling for components, compatible with dark mode preferences.
